short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Utlize Limble Search capabilities to find the part price information you need. When you need it, wherever you need it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Price gouging is real: we are seeing a 61% average price difference for the same parts. Limble Search helps you find the best prices on parts across multiple vendors. The plugin is designed to enhance your online shopping experience by providing seamless price comparison and search capabilities without needing to navigate away from the page you're currently viewing.

Here’s how it works:
• Shop as you normally would. You’ll see a "Shop Prices" button or a floating button in the top right corner of your browser. Click it to open Limble Search in a new tab, where you can compare prices from different vendors.
• Highlight any product name or text, right-click, and select "Shop Prices on Limble Search" to search for it without disrupting your workflow.
• You can also type a product name directly into the plugin to start a search anytime.

Add Limble Search to your browser today and shop with confidence.
